definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Front axles are connected directly to the transaxle and provide power to the front wheels.
sentences.chinese: 前车轴是直接连接到跨桥和提供电力的前轮。

sentences.english: On front wheels with disc brake mounts the disc side will have more tension.
sentences.chinese: 与盘式制动器前轮支架，光盘方将有更多的紧张。

sentences.english: For a long time, automobile front wheels shimmy is treated as fault to comprehend and deal with.
sentences.chinese: 汽车前轮摆振往往被当作故障进行理解和处理。

sentences.english: The nosewheel strut uses a single heavy-duty bungee for shock absorbency.
sentences.chinese: 在前轮支撑蹦极使用税为吸收冲击单重。

sentences.english: The front wheel of the bicycle was out of shape.
Should pay attention to tighten hand braking and tucked the front wheels.
sentences.chinese: 要注意拉紧手制动和塞好前轮。

sentences.english: This car has a front-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车是前轮传动的。

sentences.english: The left front wheel of the car spun off, and the car crashed into a tree.
sentences.chinese: 那辆车的左前轮脱落，汽车撞上一棵树。

sentences.english: Of or relating to four-wheel drive.
At this time, it appears we have no nose-wheel steering.
sentences.chinese: 目前看来前轮转向装置已经坏了。

sentences.english: We promised to convert our entire fleet of cars to front-wheel-drive technology.
sentences.chinese: 我们保证要把所有的汽车都改为用前轮驱动。

sentences.english: Front-wheel drive will be standard but all-wheel drive should be optional.
sentences.chinese: 标准搭配前轮驱动，但可额外自选四轮驱动。

sentences.english: This alignment gives the front wheels a slight toe-in when the car is at rest.
sentences.chinese: 汽车停着的时侯，恰当的定位应使前轮稍微具有前束。

sentences.english: But motors could be fitted to the front wheels as well to provide four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 但是也可以通过在前轮上安装电动机来实现四轮驱动。

sentences.english: Mike popped a wheelie as he drove out of the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 迈克将车开出车道时一下子抬起车的前轮。

sentences.english: Raise the front of the vehicle off the ground and install tow dollies under front wheels.
sentences.chinese: 将车辆前方举起离地，在前轮下安装两个拖曳支架。

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
pedal (in a car, on a piano etc)/treadle/footstool/footrest/footboard
